name: cypress1
description: - Clone repo - Ensure you have node.js installed https://nodejs.org/en/download/ - Run 'npm install cypress --save-dev' - run npx open, often you will not have executable permissions, to fix this run chmod 755 *Directory-name*     For example mine was:          *chmod 755 /Users/ryan/Library/Caches/Cypress/6.6.0/Cypress.app/Contents/MacOS/Cypress* -  Install cypress-axe: *npm install --save-dev cypress-axe* -  Install peer dependencies: *npm install --save-dev cypress axe-core*
